nodes.title: iHeart AdBuilder - Bring the power of radio to your business

nodes.excerpt: Resemble AIâ€™s new built-in integration with GPT-3 can generate realistic ad copy and conversations instantly. You can use the existing library of professional voices, or create your own custom AI voice, to generate high-quality voiceovers and dialogues.

nodes.excerpt: Zealous lets any creator: - Create a home page for all their live activity - Build a mailing list of their true fans - Engage in realtime with fans via live rooms - Monetize through tips, tickets, and subscriptions Join our live Q&A! https://community.zealous.space/r/4ckvmy http://bit.ly/zealous-qa

nodes.excerpt: It's easy to forget to take time out of your day for mindfulness and meditation. The Silent Podcast is an automated podcast feed that provides a daily 10-minute pocket of quiet and stillness in your routine.

nodes.excerpt: Blushh is an app where women in Asia listen to short sensual audio stories to explore their fantasies. With a simple monthly subscription, we are an alternative to male-oriented pornography.
nodes.title: Blushh - Sensual stories for women in Asia

nodes.excerpt: A text editor where you can type dialogues, add emotions (crying, shouting, hatred, polite, out of breath, etc.). Select from a set of voices (hero, villain, AI, merchant, kid, etc.), add background effects, and export as a human-like voice in studio quality.

nodes.excerpt: Introducing Minis, allowing users to add a game, a poll, or other interactive components directly into a room. Minis add to the current conversation, and offer new things to talk about. The first Minis include Polls, Would You Rather and Chosen At Random.
